name: Anti DDoS
description: Provides enhanced protection against DDoS attacks by analyzing and filtering suspicious traffic.

USE_ANTIDDOS.help: Enable or disable anti DDoS protection to mitigate high traffic spikes.
USE_ANTIDDOS.label: Enable anti DDoS

ANTIDDOS_METRICS_DICT_SIZE.help: Size of in-memory storage for DDoS metrics (e.g., 10M, 500k).
ANTIDDOS_METRICS_DICT_SIZE.label: Anti DDoS metrics dict size

ANTIDDOS_THRESHOLD.help: Maximum suspicious requests allowed from a single IP before blocking.
ANTIDDOS_THRESHOLD.label: Anti DDoS threshold number

ANTIDDOS_WINDOW_TIME.help: Time window (seconds) to detect abnormal request patterns.
ANTIDDOS_WINDOW_TIME.label: Anti DDoS window time

ANTIDDOS_STATUS_CODES.help: HTTP status codes treated as suspicious for DDoS analysis.
ANTIDDOS_STATUS_CODES.label: Anti DDoS status codes

ANTIDDOS_DISTINCT_IP.help: Minimum distinct IP count before enabling anti DDoS measures.
ANTIDDOS_DISTINCT_IP.label: Anti DDoS distinct IP
